divs: sighting detailssetting: night, mostly clear sky. at around 9:15pm pst\pdt, inside my home, in a suburb of aliso viejo, ca, i was disturbed by the sounds of a helicopter outside in a "search" pattern. after about five minutes of the helicopter noise, and also my wife becoming disturbed with the noise, i went outside to investigate. note: normally a helicopter (police or otherwise) would seldom fly over the house, and would not remain in close pattern above my neighborhood. after going outside, i identified at least two helicopters in an irregular "orbit" pattern at about 200-500ft agl at the south\east region of boundary oak and wood canyon, just north\east of soka university. immediately adjacent, i observed a disc shaped ufo at the same location in a wobbling hover mode (pitching and rolling about 15-30deg) and with a slow (not more than 20-30 mph) north\west translation. the object shape, flight pattern, lights, and sound, was clearly not consistent with conventional rotary wing aircraft or their flight patterns, and hence, i concluded it was an ���unidentified��� object. the ufo disc shape was inferred by a clearly observed ring of discrete lights (between 8-15 lights, may have been circles or squares) that appeared to line the perimeter of the bottom of the object. i was not able to see any other shape features. i am uncertain on the color of the lights (may have been white\yellow\orange). the helicopters (at least two were observed) were holding in a tight pattern to the south\east and to the north\west of the object, and appeared to be "investigating" the object. the type and markings on the helicopters were not visible from my location. the helicopters kept a distance of a few hundred feet from the object. the size of the object was estimated somewhere between 30 to 40 ft in diameter, and was at least the size of the adjacent helicopters. the object did not make any noise that i could discern over the sound of the adjacent helicopters. both my wife and i observed the object in a slow hover for at least a few minutes. then, it moved slowly to the north\west and below the horizon of the homes in the suburb. we did not see the object or helicopters reappear to our location. i then left the neighborhood in my car to try and find the object. in the process, i came across a group of at least 4 neighbors together outside, at least one with a camera, that all observed the same object, and were visibly agitated. i���m not sure if the person with the camera got a picture. from a hilltop near soka university, i could see the helicopters in the distance to the north\west, now in the laguna beach area. from that distance, i could not discern the object. a few minutes later, there appeared to be additional helicopters that joined the "search", probably 3-5 helicopters in total. by 10:30pm, and after looking from two other hill\mountain top locations, the number of aircraft lights decreased to at least 1 (probably a helicopter). i then ended my searching at this point.
Summary: Disc in hover above suburb observed by helicopters and witnesses
